name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForAdrenalDisorders
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Adrenal Disorders
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to disorders that result in a hyper and/or hypo function of the adrenal gland and is listed as a chronic metabolic disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes hyperaldosteronism, hypoaldosteronism, addison's disease, adrenoleukodystrophy, ACTH deficiency, cushing's syndrome, congenital adrenal hyperplasia, nelson syndrome, Waterhouse-Friderichsen syndrome and structural abnormalities such as cysts and nodules.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes transient neonatal or pregnancy related adrenal gland disorders and adrenal gland neoplasms.)

concept.display: Adrenal cortical hypofunction due to interruption of corticosteroid therapy (disorder)
Hypercortisolism due to bilateral adrenocortical hyperplasia (disorder)
Familial steroid-resistant nephrotic syndrome with adrenal insufficiency (disorder)
Virilization of female due to adrenal hyperfunction (disorder)
Male sexual precocity with adrenal hyperplasia (disorder)
Injury of adrenal gland with open wound into abdominal cavity (disorder)
Injury of adrenal gland without open wound into abdominal cavity (disorder)
Steroid suppression of adrenocorticotropic hormone secretion (disorder)
Adrenal insufficiency due to adrenal metastasis (disorder)
Salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia with virilism (disorder)
Testicular hypofunction due to defect in adrenocortical hormone synthesis (disorder)
Aldosteronism with nodular hyperplasia of adrenal cortex (disorder)
Hyperaldosteronism co-occurrent with hyperplasia of the adrenal cortex (disorder)
Juxtaglomerular hyperplasia co-occurrent with secondary hyperaldosteronism (disorder)
Congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to cytochrome P450 oxidoreductase deficiency (disorder)
Congenital lipoid adrenal hyperplasia due to steroidogenic acute regulatory protein deficiency (disorder)
Classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency (disorder)
Hypercortisolism due to macronodular adrenal hyperplasia (disorder)
Sex reversion, kidney, adrenal and lung dysgenesis syndrome (disorder)
Primary immunodeficiency with natural killer cell deficiency and adrenal insufficiency (disorder)
Inherited isolated adrenal insufficiency due to partial cytochrome P450 family 11 subfamily A member 1 deficiency (disorder)
Familial adrenal hypoplasia with absent pituitary luteinizing hormone (disorder)
46,XY disorder of sex development, adrenal insufficiency due to cytochrome P450 family 11 subfamily A member 1 deficiency (disorder)
Hyperandrogenism due to cortisone reductase deficiency (disorder)
Primary hyperaldosteronism, seizures, neurological abnormalities syndrome (disorder)
Congenital lipoid adrenal hyperplasia due to steroidogenic acute regulatory protein deficiency classic form (disorder)
Congenital lipoid adrenal hyperplasia due to steroidogenic acute regulatory protein deficiency non classic form (disorder)
Congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency non-classic form (disorder)
Congenital abnormal fusion of adrenal glands (disorder)
Congenital abnormal shape of adrenal gland (disorder)
